text:
lar (Uveal) Melanoma
		                    Treatment of extraocular extension melanoma that has spread to the bone around the eye may include the following:         -  Surgery (exenteration).    - A clinical trial.        An effective treatment for metastatic intraocular melanoma has not been found. A clinical trial may be a treatment option. Talk with your doctor about your treatment options.   Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with extraocul
